aboutme.description: Personal Background Greetings! I'm thrilled to welcome you to my corner of the internet. Before we delve into the technical details, let me share a bit about who I am and what drives me in my journey as a software engineer. Accessibility and inclusivity are not just buzzwords for me; they're principles I actively incorporate
